backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing summaries of all frontend component files, describing the Milletmist website structure including navigation, hero, about, team, products, farmer support, contact, and footer sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application from main.tsx into a root div element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component that assembles all page sections (Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, Footer) with proper section IDs for navigation.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component showcasing Raavni Agrobyte's women-led mission, company story with team image, and four value cards highlighting women empowerment, quality, social impact, and natural goodness.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section displaying three contact information cards (location, email, phone) with icons and a call-to-action message inviting visitors to join the Milletmist journey.
frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx: Team section displaying four team member profile cards with images, names, roles, descriptions, and LinkedIn button placeholders in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/FarmerSupport.ts: Farmer support section with farmer image and four impact cards explaining direct partnership, sustainable income, training support, and community building initiatives for ultra-poor millet farmers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Milletmist logo, company branding, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with background image, logo, heading, tagline, feature pills (Natural Millets, Women-Led, Farmer Support), and CTA buttons that scroll to products and about sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed navigation bar component with logo, desktop/mobile menus, scroll-based styling changes, active section highlighting, and smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products section displaying two millet-based products (Protein Bar and Energy Boost) with images, descriptions, benefits badges, and a list of general millet health benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor, handling both authenticated and anonymous states, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and providing login/logout functionality with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks to interact with the backend; currently empty with no implemented queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-tone color palette (terracotta, sage, amber) for light and dark modes, plus custom gradient utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH color variables, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), extended border radius, shadows, and animations for accordions and fade-in effects. Includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a website for Raavni Agrobyte's Milletmist brand, tracking 8 implemented features including hero section, about us, products showcase, farmer support, team section, contact form, responsive navigation, and earthy visual design with millet/women empowerment themes.
